name: a-2019be-app
description: **A -** First, there will be an overview of the task at hand, this very first step will be necessary to show possible weak points (skill and tech-wise) and the need to study new lib APIs and/or their DSL. ### Q2: What technologies will be used?  - **BackEnd**  -- ExpressJS  -- PostgreSQL  -- Waterline*  -- JsonWebToken  -- Jest  - **FrontEnd**  -- ReactJS  -- AphroditeJS  -- Jest  -- lodash  -- ReactRouter  -- Redux, *et cetera*  -- TypeScript*
author: Rafael Maciel
